description.zh-cn: 由林立果等人于1971年3月策划撰写的旨在推翻毛泽东统治的武装政变计划。
description.en: An armed coup plan drafted in March 1971 by Lin Liguo and others, aimed at overthrowing Mao Zedong's rule.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中国共产党中央委员会副主席，在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, died in a plane crash during the September 13th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 林彪之子，《“571工程”纪要》的主要策划者。
description.en: Son of Lin Biao and the main planner of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党革命家、政治家、战略家和理论家，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese communist revolutionary, politician, strategist, and theorist, former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 指林彪、叶群、林立果等人在政变计划败露后乘机出逃，最终坠毁于蒙古温都尔汗的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event where Lin Biao, Ye Qun, Lin Liguo, and others fled by plane after their coup plot was exposed, eventually crashing in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国人民解放军空军司令部办公室副主任，《“571工程”纪要》的共同密谋者。
description.en: Then Deputy Director of the Office of the PLA Air Force Command, co-conspirator of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 时任中国人民解放军空军司令部办公室处长，《“571工程”纪要》的执笔起草者。
description.en: Then Division Chief of the Office of the PLA Air Force Command, the drafter of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 《“571工程”纪要》的共同密谋者。
description.en: Co-conspirator of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，被《“571工程”纪要》视为林彪的主要政治对手。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four', considered by the 'Project 571 Outline' as Lin Biao's main political rival.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，与张春桥等人一同被《“571工程”纪要》称为“文人力量”。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four', referred to along with Zhang Chunqiao and others as the 'literati force' in the 'Project 571 Outline'.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的亲信之一。
description.en: One of Lin Biao's confidants.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的亲信之一。
description.en: One of Lin Biao's confidants.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的亲信之一。
description.en: One of Lin Biao's confidants.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 1976年4月在天安门广场发生的以悼念周恩来、反对“四人帮”为主题的群众抗议运动。
description.en: A mass protest movement that took place in Tiananmen Square in April 1976, centered on mourning Zhou Enlai and opposing the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1976年9月9日逝世，是导致文化大革命结束的关键事件之一。
description.en: Mao Zedong's death on September 9, 1976, which was one of the key events leading to the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 指1976年10月6日，华国锋、叶剑英、汪东兴等人逮捕“四人帮”的事件，标志着文化大革命的结束。
description.en: Refers to the event on October 6, 1976, when Hua Guofeng, Ye Jianying, Wang Dongxing, and others arrested the 'Gang of Four', marking the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅元帅之子。
description.en: Son of Marshal Chen Yi.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second-generation central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of the Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 林立果是林彪的儿子。
description.en: Lin Liguo is the son of Lin Biao.

description.zh-cn: 林立果是《“571工程”纪要》的主要策划者。
description.en: Lin Liguo was the main planner of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 周宇驰是《“571工程”纪要》的共同密谋者之一。
description.en: Zhou Yuchi was one of the co-conspirators of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 于新野执笔起草了《“571工程”纪要》。
description.en: Yu Xinye drafted the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 李伟信是《“571工程”纪要》的共同密谋者之一。
description.en: Li Weixin was one of the co-conspirators of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 该纪要是一份旨在推翻毛泽东统治地位的军事政变计划，文中直接批评毛泽东为“封建暴君”。
description.en: This outline was a military coup plan aimed at overthrowing Mao Zedong's rule, directly criticizing him in the text as a "feudal tyrant".

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: Lin Biao died in a plane crash during the September 13th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 林立果在九一三事件中坠机身亡。
description.en: Lin Liguo died in a plane crash during the September 13th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件的发生导致《“571工程”纪要》政变计划败露并最终失败。
description.en: The occurrence of the September 13th Incident led to the exposure and ultimate failure of the coup plan outlined in the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东不顾周恩来等人劝阻，执意批准将《“571工程”纪要》全文下发全国进行传达和批判。
description.en: Disregarding the advice of Zhou Enlai and others, Mao Zedong insisted on approving the nationwide distribution of the full text of the "Project 571 Outline" for circulation and criticism.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 经毛泽东首肯后，中共中央以文件的形式将《“571工程”纪要》向全国人民传达。
description.en: After Mao Zedong's approval, the CCP Central Committee circulated the "Project 571 Outline" to the entire nation in the form of an official document.

description.zh-cn: 《“571工程”纪要》的策划者认为，以张春桥为首的“文人力量”正在发展，可能取代林彪的接班人地位，因此将其视为主要政治对手。
description.en: The planners of the "Project 571 Outline" believed that the 'literati force' led by Zhang Chunqiao was growing and could replace Lin Biao as successor, thus viewing him as a main political rival.

description.zh-cn: 林彪与毛泽东在中共九届二中全会上的分歧公开化，最终以林彪策划“571工程”政变及九一三事件中的死亡告终。
description.en: The conflict between Lin Biao and Mao Zedong became public at the Second Plenary Session of the 9th CCP Central Committee, culminating in Lin Biao's planning of the "Project 571" coup and his death in the September 13th Incident.

description.zh-cn: 王维国被认为是林彪的亲信之一。
description.en: Wang Weiguo was considered one of Lin Biao's confidants.

description.zh-cn: 陈励耘被认为是林彪的亲信之一。
description.en: Chen Liyun was considered one of Lin Biao's confidants.

description.zh-cn: 江腾蛟被认为是林彪的亲信之一。
description.en: Jiang Tengjiao was considered one of Lin Biao's confidants.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来等人曾劝阻毛泽东，反对将《“571工程”纪要》全文下发。
description.en: Zhou Enlai and others advised Mao Zedong against distributing the full text of the "Project 571 Outline".

description.zh-cn: 《“571工程”纪要》中的思想和语句对1976年天安门广场“四五运动”中的诗篇和言论产生了明显影响。
description.en: The ideas and phrases from the "Project 571 Outline" significantly influenced the poems and speeches during the 1976 "Four-Five Movement" in Tiananmen Square.

description.zh-cn: 该纪要对毛泽东的直接批判以及其在全国的传达，客观上揭示了文化大革命的内部矛盾和弊病，起到了启蒙作用，动摇了文革的群众基础。
description.en: The document's direct criticism of Mao Zedong and its nationwide circulation objectively revealed the internal contradictions and problems of the Cultural Revolution, serving an enlightening role and shaking the movement's mass support.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的逝世是导致文化大革命结束的关键事件之一。
description.en: Mao Zedong's death was one of the key events that led to the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 怀仁堂政变（粉碎“四人帮”）标志着文化大革命的正式结束。
description.en: The Huairentang Coup (the smashing of the 'Gang of Four') marked the official end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 陈小鲁是陈毅元帅的儿子。
description.en: Chen Xiaolu is the son of Marshal Chen Yi.

description.zh-cn: 根据魏京生的评论，邓小平后来的改革，除了不反毛泽东之外，其余内容均是按照《“571工程”纪要》来的。
description.en: According to commentary by Wei Jingsheng, Deng Xiaoping's later reforms, apart from not opposing Mao Zedong, followed the contents of the "Project 571 Outline".

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会
